title: Gangplank, the Six-Fingered Man?
body: I count 6 fingers, counting the thumb. So, should we call Inigo Montoya? Because I think we found the man who killed his father.

replies.body:
"_Beautiful isn't it? It took me half a lifetime to invent it. I'm sure you've discovered my deep and abiding interest in pain. Presently I'm writing the definitive work on the subject, so I want you to be totally honest with me on how the machine makes you feel. This being our first try, I'll use the lowest setting._"

While I adore a good Princess Bride quote as much as the next person, and while the above quote might seem in line with Gangplank's current artistic hobbies, I'm not sure he has 6 fingers.  I think finger number 4 is actually his rather long thumb, wrapped round the pistol grip.  Good eye, though!

That would be a grotesquely long thumb. Either Gangplank has a deformed thumb, or Riot's Narrative team made a simple art mistake.

#Riot Art Fail.

Not that big of a deal.

Let's move on to other things.

> [{quoted}](name=Impetual,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rXxq1pOU,comment-id=00030006,timestamp=2015-07-29T08:06:49.953+0000)
>
> That would be a grotesquely long thumb. Either Gangplank has a deformed thumb, or **Riot's Narrative team made a simple art mistake**.

Narrative team... wat.

The narrative team doesn't work on art.
it's not even that long, I just checked when I grap a pistol it looks exactly like that, with the thumb and middle finger overlapping a bit.
shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhuuutup, you're ruining the joke!
So wait... that means he has no opposable thumb. . .
I see it check finger four again, it's going the right way.

It isn't even wrapped, he's loosely holding the pistol (more of a rifle honestly) Thumb and Index finger extended, keeping it balanced in his palm using three fingers, and his shoulder is keeping it in place.

It looks really awkward since the angle of the gun makes his thumb look ridiculously long.

Edit: I was wrong, his thumb is curled in meeting his Ring Finger, same principle though.

Don't worry about it Bio.

Slight artwork fail by Riot.

 It happens, don't let it get you down. We still love Riot anyways, regardless of the flaws.
hello my name is inigo montoya, you killed my father {{champion:114}} prepare to die.

He's the Author!

I think the 4th finger is actually the thumb running along the outside of the gun, you just cant see it because the artwork gives no distinction.

Interesting but I think its just blurry art. 

Digit 4 is the thumb facing upwards, connecting back with the middle finger. 

So basically its pinky, ring and middle finger wrapped around the posterior  handle. Index point up around the trigger, and thumb wrapped around the anterior handle.

http://www.lolking.net/models?champion=41&skin=0

Looking at the model, Your finger 5 is actually finger 4. 

Your Finger 4 looks to be the thumb.
Upvoting because of that reference there that likely half the kids and teens on here do not get. I loved that movie.
that movie
Might be the pistol trigger, seems to be the same color as the gun too.

Seems like 7 fingers lol 
{{champion:74}}  : A wise choice!
The digit labeled as "4" is actually a very long thumb. Get your eye-glasses prescription checked. Its time.

Wouldn't be surprised that Gangplank in all of his badassery made time in between stealing Swain's ship and pissing off the Order of Shadows to murder Ingio Montoya's father, but "finger" number four is actually his thumb.  Although I'll admit anatomically if that was the case, he's holding his sword in a very uncomfortable way to his index finger.
numbah 4 is the thumb breh.

:D

I think it's his thumb, the thumb would normally curl infront of the 2 middle fingers. Especially with the index finger on the trigger, holding the thumb next to the fingers feels very awkward and loose grip. Fingers/hands are really _really_ hard to draw.

http://i.imgur.com/LHtnrhJ.png

There, I fixed it, yw Riot
